definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: He who is creingestedd an idiot is never cured.
sentences.chinese: 生成的傻子总是治不好的。

sentences.english: Is he, you know, like some kind of weird simpleton?
sentences.chinese: 那个谁，你知道吗，像古怪的傻子似的是谁？

sentences.english: No one wants to fail or look dumb in front of others.
sentences.chinese: 没有人希望在别人面前显得失败或者像个傻子。

sentences.english: House: Only an idiot gets between Ahab and his whale.
sentences.chinese: 唯有傻子才会横在亚哈和白鲸之间。

sentences.english: They still gonna leave after, no ways that they will always beside u.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些就是花光你的钱，你都象傻子一样不知道。

sentences.english: He looked at me as if I were a simpleton.
sentences.chinese: 他看着我的样子就好像我是个傻子。

sentences.english: I trust an indiscreet fool and suspect a lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 吾信任轻率之傻子而猜疑律师。

sentences.english: If you meet bet will win, the fool would doubt you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你逢赌必赢的话，傻子也会怀疑你。

sentences.english: A proverb goes, "Better to lose with a wise man than win with a fool."
sentences.chinese: 有一句依地语谚语说得好，“宁输智者，不赢傻子。”

sentences.english: Since there are so many deceivers, it is very obvious that idiots are not enough。
sentences.chinese: 骗子太多，傻子的数量明显跟不上了。

sentences.english: The writer sings an elegy of concuss the spirit returns to bowel for fool's tragedy destiny.
sentences.chinese: 作者为傻子的悲剧命运唱了一曲荡气回肠的挽歌。

sentences.english: We don't know. We really seem like total idiots.
sentences.chinese: 也不知道，好像傻子一样。

sentences.english: Cheater too obvious, fool enough to use.
sentences.chinese: 骗子太多，傻子明显不够用了。

sentences.english: He read her sentence, cheater so much, not enough obviously.
sentences.chinese: 他念着她的一句话，骗子那么多，明显傻子不够用。

sentences.english: You're a group of incredibly well-educated dumb people.
sentences.chinese: 你们是一群受过良好教育的傻子。

definition: to be foolish/to play dumb/to gaze absentmindedly
